snippet.title: Somnis - Rumble Rush - Gameplay Android | iOS
snippet.description:
Somnis - Rumble Rush - Gameplay Android | iOS | NFT Game  (by OTTM LABS)
Categories: Strategy
Languages: English
Status: Official Launch - Beta - Global 
Size: 600 MB
Internet: Online
Platform - Android | iOS 

Somnis: Rumble Rush is an exciting real-time strategy game. It combines strategic thinking with quick reflexes, allowing players to build diverse decks and compete to achieve top records. Enjoy a perfect blend of PC RTS depth and mobile gaming convenience, anytime, anywhere.

World
Enter Somnis, a realm of interconnected dream worlds. Trapped beings endlessly compete for survival and escape. Dream Land, created by dreamers, turned into a battleground when their traumas spawned Nightmares. Dreamers then envisioned heroes to protect themselves.

Card System
In Somnis: Rumble Rush, you'll find units, buildings, and spells as cards, each with unique traits and stories:

- Units: Characters with distinct backgrounds and goals, enriching the Somnis world.
- Buildings: Provide strategic advantages in battles.
- Spells: Magical abilities that can change the course of a fight.

Build your deck with various cards to execute personalized strategies, adding depth to the gameplay.

Card Synthesis and Equipment
Combine cards to create more powerful versions and use equipment items from the village to enhance your units, adding layers of strategy and customization.

League System
Compete in leagues to achieve top records and earn special rewards. Higher competition levels and greater rewards await those who excel in leagues.

💡 Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.ottm.somnis
💡 APK https://apkcombo.com/somnis-rumble-rush/io.ottm.somnis/
💡 App Store https://apps.apple.com/ca/app/somnis-rumble-rush/id6497167674
💡 Web https://overtake.world/games/obt/somnis
  ==========================
✅ Website (More new content) - https://www.palmassgames.ru
👉 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL96hUx2jy8gfcFLRn8NlHPX-guajC4NG-
======================================

Subscribe to the channel, it will motivate me to find more new content for you!
Many thanks!
